text: Gideon then said to God, “Do not be angry with me if I speak once more. Let me make just one more test with the fleece. Let the fleece alone be dry, but let there be dew on all the ground.”
The following were their dwelling places, by encampments in their territories. To the sons of Aaron who belonged to the clan of the Kohathites, since the lot fell to them,
listen from heaven, the place of your enthronement, to their prayer and petitions, and uphold their cause. Forgive your people who have sinned against you.
When the sun shone on the gold and bronze shields, the mountains gleamed with their brightness and blazed like flaming torches.
How then can it be thought or claimed that they are gods?
So he gave orders to have them sit down in groups on the green grass.
And he told them a parable, “Can a blind person guide a blind person? Will not both fall into a pit?
And this is the will of the one who sent me, that I should not lose anything of what he gave me, but that I should raise it [on] the last day.
